ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/jdepoix/youtube-transcript-api
ns0:entry.ns0:content: This is a python API which allows you to get the transcript/subtitles for a given YouTube video. It also works for automatically generated subtitles and it does not require an API key nor a headless browser, like other selenium based solutions do!

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/opendatalab/MinerU
ns0:entry.ns0:content: A high-quality tool for convert PDF to Markdown and JSON.一站式开源高质量数据提取工具，将PDF转换成Markdown和JSON格式。
